GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE MEMBERS INCLUDE THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7B

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS PERFORM AN ANNUAL REVIEW OF CONFLICTS OF INTEREST.
